system.domainDescription:
The idol gains the ability to elevate members of its cult into minor sins. One of these can appear a scene when fighting the idol or its cult. 

Apostle (Sin). Execution talisman 4. Armed with supernatural strength and mutated blades. Reactions: Inflict stress. Attacks with: Mutated body, mundane firearms or blades. (1) 3 stress, (2/3): 2 stress, (4+): 1 stress. Or: create a complication or threat: Create a fleshy clone of itself, unleash a flurry of attacks, mutate further, move impossibly fast. Or: Exort (1-3): An ally of the apostle heals slashes on their execution clock depending on the risk die (1: 2 ticks, 2-3: 1 tick). The next time that ally inflicts stress on an exorcist, they inflict +1 stress.
